game.name: Eternity's Echo: Patient Zero
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: As Rayne Williams, an elite agent of the D.I.B you were deployed into the zone. Your team is missing and you're surrounded by both paranormal nightmares and mercs. Guided by your partner Sam, you must survive this chaos and uncover the mystery of "Patient Zero".
game.shortDescriptionEn: As Rayne Williams, an elite agent of the D.I.B you were deployed into the zone. Your team is missing and you're surrounded by both paranormal nightmares and mercs. Guided by your partner Sam, you must survive this chaos and uncover the mystery of "Patient Zero".
